audio_description: Hello everyone, welcome to Home Cooking with me, Hema Subramanian. Chicken biryani is a go-to dish for most chicken lovers. There are several varieties, and today I'm sharing a special one — Mughlai Chicken Dum Biryani. It’s mild, rich, and very tasty. So let's get started!
